oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from Thelma Sanders Hunter Oral History Interview, 2011 February 22
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
Excerpt from an oral history interview with Thelma Sanders Hunter, conducted on February 22, 2011 by Susannah Gibbons as part of the Flood 2010 Digital History Project. Thelma Sanders-Hunter, a Bordeaux resident, describes the support she received from the North Nashville/Bordeaux Restore the Dream Center and volunteers after her home flooded.
The complete interview is available in the Special Collections Division.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Sanders Hunter, Thelma, 1945- --Interviews
